headline: Evercore ISI Maintains a Hold on Arch Capital Group (ACGL)
summary: Arch Capital Group Ltd. (NASDAQ:ACGL) is one of the best cheap stocks to buy for beginners. In a report released on September 8, David Motemaden from Evercore ISI maintained a Hold rating on Arch Capital Group Ltd. (NASDAQ:ACGL) and set a price target of $97.00. The same day, Arch Capital Group Ltd. (NASDAQ:ACGL) announced that […]
